pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
During a phone call today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and the NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg discussed the upcoming NATO Summit on July 11-12, 2018, and the importance of the Alliance’s unity and solidarity on defence and security issues.

The two leaders also discussed the Prime Minister’s visit to Latvia and Canada’s significant contributions to the Alliance. 

Prime Minister Trudeau reaffirmed the importance of the Alliance and the transatlantic bond that unites Europe and North America.
